detectors.description: Proxy (../../smart-contract-sanctuary/ethereum/contracts/mainnet/proxies/0.4.24/f6b739084464bf0caddba440b03850507e656026_ForeignMultiAMBErc20ToErc677.sol/f6b739084464bf0caddba440b03850507e656026_ForeignMultiAMBErc20ToErc677.sol#1258-1347) is a proxy, but doesn't seem upgradeable.

TokenProxy (../../smart-contract-sanctuary/ethereum/contracts/mainnet/proxies/0.4.24/f6b739084464bf0caddba440b03850507e656026_ForeignMultiAMBErc20ToErc677.sol/f6b739084464bf0caddba440b03850507e656026_ForeignMultiAMBErc20ToErc677.sol#1369-1422) may be an upgradeable proxy.
_impl is declared in the proxy.
Proxy.fallback()._impl (../../smart-contract-sanctuary/ethereum/contracts/mainnet/proxies/0.4.24/f6b739084464bf0caddba440b03850507e656026_ForeignMultiAMBErc20ToErc677.sol/f6b739084464bf0caddba440b03850507e656026_ForeignMultiAMBErc20ToErc677.sol#1272) gets value from a cross-contract call: IBridgeMediator(bridgeContractAddr).tokenImage()
IBridgeMediator appears to be a Beacon contract for the proxy
The address of IBridgeMediator is stored as a state variable: TokenProxy.bridgeContractAddr
Could not find setter for bridgeContractAddr
No setter functions found to search for compatibility checks.
